testcase.classname: As a provider, I want to be able to create a new blog record via API connection.
testcase.name: The API must verify that the new blog record to be created through the API has been created.
testcase.system-out: * The api user sets "api/blog/25" path parameters...........................passed * The api user sends a GET request and saves the returned response..........passed * The api user verifies that the status code is 200.........................passed

testcase.classname: As a provider, I want to be able to create a new blog record via API connection.
testcase.name: The API must verify that the new blog record to be created through the API has been created. 2
testcase.system-out: * The api user sets "api/blog/26" path parameters...........................passed * The api user sends a GET request and saves the returned response..........passed * The api user verifies that the status code is 200.........................passed
